posts.post_content: I would like to purchase an Old Judge of either Quinn (preferrably Joe) from the set. No major creases or trimmed please. Please send scans and prices to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url] Thanks!
Tony--There is one on Ebay right now

Someone pointed that one out to me. I have a hard time bidding on a card with a photo taken from the Hubble telescope:D I emailed the seller and asked for better photos and he said he doesn't know how to email photos:confused: I might be missing out on a deal but it just seems a little fishy to me (bad photo, can't get photos etc.)
